thread.title: Ilaiyaraaja to compose A tribute to kalam
thread.title_full: Ilaiyaraaja to compose A tribute to kalam - The Times of India

author: Nandita Ravi
title: Ilaiyaraaja to compose A tribute to kalam
text:
As the birth anniversary of the late former prez APJ Abdul Kalam nears (October 15), his family will be paying tribute to him, in a special event being organized in the city. The event, which will see Isaignani Ilaiyaraaja preside as a special guest, will also mark the launch of an anthem, composed by the legendary music director himself.
Abdul Ghani, Kalam's aide, who is organising the event, says, "There will be a special event, where the family members of Kalam, including his brother, nieces and nephews, will be in attendance. The event will pay tribute to the late president, and will also mark the launch of a foundation for turning his Vision 20:20 into reality. Ilaiyaraaja, has composed a Kalam Anthem for the event and this will also be launched then."
